name: Expense Tracker
overview: The Expense Tracker application provides a comprehensive solution for tracking expenses, managing budgets, and categorizing expenses. It leverages the mentioned tech stack to deliver an efficient and user-friendly experience for managing personal finances

items.title: Register
items.description: Users can create a new account by providing their necessary information, such as username, email, and password. The registration process securely stores their credentials for future login.

items.title: Login
items.description: Registered users can log into the application using their credentials. Upon successful authentication, they gain access to their personalized dashboard and can start managing their expenses, budgets, and categories.

items.title: Line Chart And Card
items.description: The Line Chart visually represents the user's expense data over time. It provides a graphical representation of how expenses have changed or fluctuated over a specific period. This helps users track their spending patterns and identify trends.

items.title: Doughnut Chart
items.description: The Doughnut Chart provides a clear and concise breakdown of the user's expenses by category. It visualizes the proportion of expenses allocated to different categories using a circular chart with segments. This allows users to quickly understand their expense distribution and identify which categories consume the most of their budget.

items.title: Most Recent Expenses
items.description: Display the 10 most recent expenses.

items.title: View Expense
items.description: Users can easily view their expenses, budgets, and categories in a clear and organized manner.

items.title: Search/Filter
items.description: Users can quickly search for specific expenses, budgets, or categories by using search functionality.

items.title: Add New Expense
items.description: Users can effortlessly add new expenses to keep track of their financial transactions.

items.title: Update/Edit Expense
items.description: Users can easily modify and update expense details, ensuring accurate records.

items.title: Delete Existing Expense
items.description: Users have the ability to delete any unwanted or no longer relevant expenses.

items.title: View Budget
items.description: Users can see a list of their budgets.

items.title: Search/Filter
items.description: Users can search for specific budgets using keywords or filters.

items.title: Budget Details
items.description: View the full details of a budget.

items.title: Add new budgets
items.description: Users can create new budgets by providing the necessary details.

items.title: Update/edit budget details
items.description: Users can modify budget information such as name, amount.

items.title: Delete existing budgets
items.description: Users can remove budgets they no longer need.

items.title: View and remove budget expenses expenses
items.description: Users can view or remove the expenses associated with each budget.

items.title: View Category
items.description: Users can easily view their existing expense categories.

items.title: Search/Filter
items.description: Users can search for specific category using keywords or filters.

items.title: Budget Details
items.description: View the full details of a category.

items.title: Add new category
items.description: Users have the ability to create new expense categories to organize their expenses.

items.title: Update/edit category details
items.description: Users can modify and update category details, such as the name or description.

items.title: Delete existing category
items.description: Users can remove category they no longer need.

items.title: View and remove category expenses expenses
items.description: Users can view or remove the expenses associated with each category.
